name: Paracetamol
uses: Used to reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain such as headaches, muscle aches, and arthritis.

name: Cetirizine
uses: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as watery eyes, runny nose, itching eyes/nose, and sneezing.

name: Montelukast
uses: Used to prevent and manage asthma symptoms and relieve symptoms of seasonal allergies.

name: Ibuprofen
uses: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used for relieving pain, fever, and inflammation.
